hints.content:
When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.

Number | Hundred Thousands | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:| :-: | :-:
$900{,}000$ |$\searrow\tealD9$ | $\searrow\redD0$ |$\searrow\goldD{0}$ | $\searrow\purpleD{0}$ | $\searrow\blueD{0}$ | $\searrow\greenD{0}$  
$900{,}000 \div 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$| $?$| $?$| $?$

Number | Hundred Thousands | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:| :-: | :-:
$900{,}000$ |$\searrow\tealD9$ | $\searrow\redD0$ |$\searrow\goldD{0}$ | $\searrow\purpleD{0}$ | $\searrow\blueD{0}$ | $\searrow\greenD{\cancel0}$  
$900{,}000 \div 10$ | |$\tealD9$ |$\redD0$| $\goldD0$| $\purpleD0$| $\blueD0$
